      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Electron flow in a circuit charging a capacitor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektronfluß in einen Stromkreis, der einen 
Kondensator auflädt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écoulement d'électron dans un circuit chargeant 
un condensateur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fluxo do elétron em um circuito que carrega um 
capacitor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Flusso dell'elettrone in un circuito che carica 
un condensatore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ροή ηλεκτρονίων σε ένα κύκλωμα που χρεώνει έναν 
πυκνωτή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Flujo del electrón en un circuito que carga un 
condensador</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This circuit diagram demonstrates the direction of electron flow in the circuit as the capacitor is being charged up.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ammeters</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Capacitors</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">charging</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">circuit diagram</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electron flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">voltage sources</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Schaltplan zeigt die Richtung des 
Elektronflusses in den Stromkreis, während der Kondensator oben 
aufgeladen wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce schéma de circuit démontre la direction de 
l'écoulement d'électron dans le circuit pendant que le condensateur 
est chargé vers le haut.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama de circuito demonstra o sentido do 
fluxo do elétron no circuito enquanto o capacitor está sendo 
carregado acima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema circuitale dimostra il senso di 
flusso dell'elettrone nel circuito mentre il condensatore sta 
caricando in su.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα κυκλωμάτων καταδεικνύει την 
κατεύθυνση της ροής ηλεκτρονίων στο κύκλωμα όπως ο πυκνωτής 
χρεώνεται επάνω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este esquema circular demuestra la dirección del
flujo del electrón en el circuito mientras que el condensador se 
está cargando para arriba.</string>
          </description>
